org.lwjgl.opengl

Class WGLARBRobustnessShareGroupIsolation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.opengl.WGLARBRobustnessShareGroupIsolation

  • public final class WGLARBRobustnessShareGroupIsolation
extends java.lang.Object
    Native bindings to the WGL_ARB_robustness_share_group_isolation extension.

    GL_ARB_robustness and WGL_ARB_create_context_robustness allow creating an OpenGL context supporting graphics reset notification behavior. WGL_ARB_robustness_share_group_isolation provides stronger guarantees about the possible side-effects of a graphics reset.

    Requires WGL_ARB_extensions_string and WGL_ARB_create_context_robustness.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int WGL_CONTEXT_RESET_ISOLATION_BIT_ARB
      Accepted as a bit in the attribute value for CONTEXT_FLAGS_ARB in the attribList argument to CreateContextAttribsARB.
